    <div id="content">
     <h1>
      WELCOME TO THE BACCUS 6MM SITE
     </h1>
     Baccus specialises in the design and production of wargames figures and accessories in the 6mm scale. Although it is often overlooked by the dominance of the 15 and 28mm scales, the smaller figures offer huge advantages in terms of flexibility, prices and ease of painting. It often comes as a pleasant surprise to our new customers that they find 6mm figures easier and quicker to paint than their coarser-scale brethren.

     <div>
      <h2>
       18th Jun 2018 :: The Joy of Six 2018
      </h2>
      <p>
       There is now less than a month to go to this year's Joy of Six and it really is looking like another outstanding show.
      </p>
      <p>
       <img alt="" src="https://www.baccus6mm.com/admin/kcfinder/upload/images/JOS18/jos2018.jpg" style="height:566px; width:400px"/>
      </p>
      <a href="http://www.baccus6mm.com/news/18-06-2018/TheJoyofSix2018/">
       read more
      </a>
     </div>
     <br/>
     <div>
      <h2>
       8th Jun 2018 :: Various, Sundry and Diverse items
      </h2>
      <p>
       We're back from the beach desperately trying to clean the sand out of various crevices, nursing bad cases of simultaneous sunburn and trenchfoot (anyone who has ever been to a seaside holiday in the UK will understand how this can happen) and facing the distasteful prospect of all the work that's got to be done now we're back in something vaguely resembling reality.
      </p>
      <p>
       We're entering a busy few weeks, so here's a few snippets of news and information.
      </p>
      <a href="http://www.baccus6mm.com/news/08-06-2018/VariousSundryandDiverseitems/">
       read more
      </a>
     </div>
     <br/>
     <div>
      <h2>
       17th May 2018 :: Baccus goes on Holiday.
      </h2>
      <p>
       <img alt="" src="data:image/jpeg;base64," style="height:150px; width:335px"/>
      </p>
      <p>
       Right here here at Baccus HQ we're getting all excited about going to the Seaside.Â Â  Flip-flops, buckets and spade, suncream, dark glasses and waterproofsÂ  are all piled high ready for packing.
      </p>
      <p>
       As a result, we'll be closing down operations for two weeks starting from 21st May until 2nd June.Â Â Â  The shopping cart will not be accepting any order over this period.
      </p>
      <p>
       We'll be leading up this sojourn with a visit to Partizan this weekend and I hope to see a few of you there.
      </p>
      <p>
      </p>
      <a href="http://www.baccus6mm.com/news/17-05-2018/BaccusgoesonHoliday/">
       read more
      </a>
